name: AiRace Xeno
description:
After the success of its predecessors, AiRace Xeno brings back the speed and adrenaline to your Nintendo 3DS™!

Take the challenge in a surprising environment and brand new levels.

• Fly extreme speeds across 13 adrenaline-fuelled tracks
• Stunning environments packed with challenging obstacles
• Take control of one of 3 high-speed, futuristic jets
• High-performance graphics and immersive 3D effects
• Compete in online leaderboards and unlock achievements
